team.intro: We believe a smile is about comfort and health, not only beauty. Every patient gets a personal approach and a natural-looking result.

members.name: Vitalii Raievskyi
members.description: Specializes in aesthetic and surgical dentistry, implant placement, and prosthetics.

members.name: Andrii Kotsiura
members.description: Complex cranio-mandibular full-mouth reconstructions. TMJ dysfunction treatment.

members.name: Vadym Tokar
members.description: Focuses on smile transformations in a single surgery.

members.name: Daria
members.description: Specializes in aesthetic and therapeutic dentistry, combining professionalism with patient comfort.
